name: Path N
title: Pathological N
notes:
**Note:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in the field distant metastasis.

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Inguignal
        Deep inguinal, NOS
           Node of Cloquet or Rosenmuller (highest deep inguinal)
        Superficial inguinal (femoral) regional lymph node
        Inguinal node, NOS (unknown if superficial or deep)

    Pelvic lymph  nodes, NOS:
        External iliac
        Internal iliac (hypogastric)
            Obturator
rows: Regional lymph node(s) cannot be assessed

Unknown; not stated
Not documented in patient record
Metastasis in a single inguinal lymph node

SINGLE regional lymph nodes, NOS

Not stated if single or multiple AND not stated if inguinal or pelvic

Regional lymph node(s), NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
Metastasis in multiple or bilateral inguinal lymph nodes

Inguinal lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N2

Metastasis in pelvic lymph node(s), unilateral or bilateral
or extranodal extension of regional lymph node metastasis

Pelvic lymph node(s), NOS

Stated as N3
